title: Phase behavior of colloidal nanoparticles and their enhancement effect on the rheological properties of polymer solutions and gels
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8513-8525
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00551A, Paper
Open Access

Liu Yang, Jiiang Ge, Hao Wu, Hongbin Guo, Jingling Shan, Guicai Zhang
The SiO2 nanoparticles exhibit stronger aggregate tendency in the negatively charged polymer solutions, therefore enhancing the viscosity of polymer solutions and the mechanical properties of their gels.
